StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetHsccMpEvents]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgId int , @SchoolYear int
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @SchoolYearStartDate date.me DECLARE @SchoolYearEndDate date.me
SET @SchoolYearStartDate = Convert(date.me, str(@SchoolYear-1)+'/7/1', 101) SET @SchoolYearEndDate = Convert(date.me, str(@SchoolYear)+'/7/1', 101)
SELECT DISTINCT hs.* INTO #SchoolList FROM MCRISS.dbo.High_School hs INNER JOIN MCRISS.USMC.vwDecendentRecrui.ngOrgs c ON hs.ORGANIZATION_ID = c.decendent
WHERE (ORGANIZATION_ID = @orgId OR c.Parent = @orgId) AND ( E.ec.ve_Date IS NULL OR ( E.ec.ve_Date IS NOT NULL AND (( hs.DELETED <> 'Y' AND E.ec.ve_Date < @SchoolYearEndDate) OR ( hs.DELETED = 'Y' AND E.ec.ve_Date < @SchoolYearEndDate AND UPDATE_DATE >= @SchoolYearStartDate) ) ) ) AND hs.School_Type <> 'COL' and hs.School_Type <> '4Y'
SELECT hsp.rowguid INTO #HighSchoolPro.le FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp INNER JOIN #SchoolList hs ON hsp.SCHOOL_CODE = hs.School_Code AND hsp.SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear
SELECT e.EventTypeId, MIN(e.StartDate) as StartDate, es.SubjectId FROM RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject es INNER JOIN #HighSchoolPro.le hsp ON es.SubjectId = hsp.rowguid INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.Event e ON es.EventId = e.ID WHERE e.IsComplete = 1 AND e.EventTypeId IN( 132, 144, 143, 139, 140, 141, 142,138) AND e.StartDate >= @SchoolYearStartDate AND e.StartDate < @SchoolYearEndDate Group By e.EventTypeId, es.SubjectId
UNION
SELECT 178 AS EventTypeId, MIN(c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) as StartDate, hsp.rowguid AS SubjectId FROM MCRISS.dbo.Contract c INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON c.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON n.rowguid = p.NWAID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectSchool ps ON p.ProspectId = ps.ProspectID INNER JOIN #SchoolList hs ON ps.SchoolId = hs.rowguid INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp ON hsp.SCHOOL_CODE = hs.School_Code AND hsp.SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear WHERE c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE >= @SchoolYearStartDate AND c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE < @SchoolYearEndDate
GROUP BY hsp.rowguid
DROP TABLE #SchoolList DROP TABLE #HighSchoolPro.le
END
